file_content.text: I need someone to hunt the Trandoshan pirate lord, Reneget Vause. Are you such an individual?
May as well ask us to hunt the ghost of Naga Sadow.
The name doesn't ring any bells.
Never heard of Reneget Vause.
A pirate of some renown. He favors lurking in the regions of space you consider uncharted, our territory mostly.
Reneget Vause has been a blight on Chiss shipping lanes and colonies for years.
And where can I find this terror?
You have a location?
I didn't ask for your advice.
Fine.
Your associate's skepticism is understandable. The Trandoshan emerges from uncharted space only to destroy.
What do you mean, Mako?
Reneget Vause is almost spacer superstition; something to tell the kids.
Just because Vause lurks in what your people quaintly refer to as the "Unknown Regions" doesn't mean he does not exist.
He is quite real and presently wreaking havoc on Chiss-occupied territory.
What else can you tell me about Vause?
I need details.
Very little, unfortunately; he's never left anyone alive to give a proper report.
This place got a name?
Which is where, exactly?
He's on Hoth, which I'd have thought would be safe from that filthy reptile.
That'll end soon.
Deliver on those promises, and you'll be generously rewarded.
Vause appears to have joined up with the White Maw, a massive confederacy of pirates pillaging Hoth's starship graveyard.
Their raids have reduced our salvage operations to smoking wreckage.
Vause your only target of interest here?
Any other White Maw bounties?
He's the only target you need concern yourself with.
Well, they know how to party.
Maybe you'll finally meet that special someone who shares your passion for making craters.
I'd choose carefully who you throw in with. The White Maw's days are numbered.
Your people can't handle a bunch of pirate scum?
You're pushovers.
The logistics for a mass deployment aren't favorable. Other arrangements have been made.
We've permitted the Empire to use Hoth for strategic purposes in exchange for their assistance dislodging the pirates.
Imperial soldiers will handle the White Maw; however, Vause is worth more to us alive.
Imperial grunts can't be trusted with this kind of work.
The Blacklist was a good call.
Works for me, executions are messy.
Alive is fine by me.
What's so special about a Trandoshan pirate?
Why do you want him alive?
That monster has inflicted unforgivable insult upon my people. The Chiss Ascendancy wishes to see him broken.
Our patrols recently captured one of the White Maw pirates out in the wastes. It may be able to point you to Vause once you arrive.
I'm transmitting credentials that will allow you unrestricted access to Hoth's surface. Use them to travel to these coordinates.
Contact me when you've secured Vause.
Mako, open a secure channel on the frequency we got from the Blacklist.
Come on, come on... signal strength is really poor. There we go... sort of.
This is... unexpected. I greet you on behalf of the Chiss Ascendancy, bounty hunter. I am Aristocra Shah'adrom'illithyr.
This holofrequency hasn't had an inquiry in quite some time. I believed there were no longer any interested parties.
If you've got a job, I've got interest.
There are now.
Don't sweat it, I'm the last hunter you're gonna need.
Consider your problems over.
I've heard that before, hunter. I want results, not bluster.
If your holo wasn't such junk, you'd probably get more replies.
It's because you look cheap.
Hoth's turbulent atmosphere makes holocommunication nigh impossible. We will have to make due.
